from claude_model_manager.config import ConfigManager, ModelConfig

# 测试智能认证切换

model_manager = ModelManager(config_manager)

config_manager.set_current_model(''AnthropicModel'')
env_vars = config_manager.export_environment_vars()
print(''环境变量:'', env_vars)

# 测试其他厂商API
